title: Trump says 2028 Olympic genetic tests planned
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said 2028 Olympic athletes will face genetic testing ahead of the Games to prevent transgender competitors from participating.

title: FBI may help arrest Texas Democrats who fled over redistricting: Trump
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the FBI might help Texas Republicans arrest Democratic lawmakers who fled the state to block Republican redistricting.

title: Trump indicates Olympians will be tested to block transgender athletes
shortDescription: Asked if he would consider genetic testing to stop transgender Olympic competitors, Trump said "there will be a very, very strong form of testing."

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene asks Trump to commute George Santos’ sentence
shortDescription: Former New York Republican congressman George Santos began a seven-year federal sentence for wire fraud and aggravated identity theft on July 25.

title: Trump administration ends Musk 'five things' email to federal workers
shortDescription: Ex-DOGE chief Elon Musk infamously said failure to respond to the email would be considered a resignation. He left the Trump administration in May.

title: Trump revives 'hate' for Taylor Swift, praises Sydney Sweeney ad
shortDescription: President Trump said he liked American Eagle's ad with Sydney Sweeney, reportedly a Republican. He knocked Taylor Swift, who endorsed Kamala Harris

title: Trump lobs accusations of discrimination at prominent banks
shortDescription: Trump alleged in a CNBC interview that JPMorgan Chase dropped him as a client without explanation and Bank of America would not take him as a client.

title: DOJ opens criminal probe into 2016 investigation of Trump and Russia
shortDescription: The DOJ has reportedly opened a grand jury probe into claims Obama officials broke the law when they investigated Russia's 2016 election interference.

title: Trump defends firing of BLS chief
shortDescription: Trump defended firing BLS commissioner Erika McEntarfer, sparking tense exchange with CNBC’s Joe Kernen on "Squawk Box" over jobs data integrity.

title: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker says Texas GOP, Trump cheating democracy
shortDescription: Texas and national Democratic leaders and a potential 2028 presidential contender says 'everything is on the table' in gerrymandering spat.

title: Trump claims Texas is entitled to more seats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told CNBC's "Squawk Box" that Texas is "entitled to five more seats."

title: Trump shows off surprising spot to oversee White House renovations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump took a surprise trip to a place that might be a first for a president: the roof of the White House.

title: Trump eyes new Fed chair: 'It will be one of four people'
shortDescription: President Trump said he has four finalists in mind to replace Fed Chair Jerome Powell while ruling out Treasury Secretary Bessent as a possibility.

title: Bill and Hillary Clinton called to testify in Jeffrey Epstein probe
shortDescription: The subpoenas order former President Bill Clinton, Hillary Clinton, and former FBI and DOJ leaders to testify.

title: CNBC host confronts Trump over baseless claims of 'rigged' jobs data
shortDescription: CNBC news anchor Joe Kernen confronted President Trump over firing the top labor statistics chief, saying it "undermines confidence in the system."

title: Trump says Republicans are 'entitled' to more Texas seats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is seeking to give the GOP more cushion ahead of the 2026 midterm elections

title: 'I'd like to run': Trump weighs in on possible 2028 bid
shortDescription: Allies of the Republican have said he should try to seek a third term and Trump has repeatedly teased the possibility since returning to office.

title: Poll finds Americans view Pope Leo XIV more favorably than Trump
shortDescription: Americans view Pope Leo XIV more favorably than President Donald Trump, Sen. Bernie Sanders and other key figures, according to a new poll.

title: What is IVF? Deadline for Trump's coverage plans passed months ago
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he wanted to have the government cover or mandate coverage of in vitro fertilization. Reports show White House has no plan

title: Daily Briefing: An order to arrest Texas Democrats
shortDescription: Blue states host Texas Democrats who fled amid redistricting battle. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: Rep. Mike Flood booed at Nebraska town hall defending Trump's signature law
shortDescription: The event in Lincoln, Nebraska, attracted a rowdy crowd that yelled and booed as Rep. Mike Flood defended Trump administration policies.

title: 11 pivotal Senate races for 2026
shortDescription: Heading into 2026, congressional Republicans look to keep their legislative advantage.

title: See Trump's changes to the White House in photos
shortDescription: Since returning to the presidency, President Donald Trump has rolled out changes at the White House. Here's what they look like.

title: Texas orders arrest of Democrats who fled to block redistricting
shortDescription: Texas Republican Governor Greg Abbott ordered the arrest of Democratic lawmakers who fled the state to block a Republican redistricting plan.

title: When have lawmakers fled to avoid a vote? What to know
shortDescription: Hiding or fleeing to prevent a vote has been used by both parties. Here’s a look at other times lawmakers have challenged votes.
